instructions.reason_for_call: You want to change your LA order to your NYC address (you prefer not to reveal it but it is in your other order). You also want to exchange Bluetooth Speaker to be the cheapest green type. Make sure you mention the two requests at the same time to the agent, but mention the exchange first.
instructions.known_info: You name is Yusuf Li and your zip code is 91148.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I actually have two requests regarding my recent order. First, I would like to exchange the Bluetooth speaker I ordered for the cheapest green type available. Also, I want to change the shipping address of my order from Los Angeles to New York City. Could you help me with these?

message.content: Hello! I actually have two requests regarding my recent order. First, I would like to exchange the Bluetooth speaker I ordered for the cheapest green type available. Also, I want to change the shipping address of my order from Los Angeles to New York City. Could you help me with these?
